title: Experience Napa Valley
seo_title: Experience Napa Valley | Wine Country Inn
seo_description: Napa Valley is filled with rolling hills and beautiful vineyards as well as some of the top restaurants and wineries in the world.
short_description: Napa Valley is filled with rolling hills and beautiful vineyards as well as some of the top restaurants and wineries in the world.
long_description:
Napa Valley is filled with rolling hills and beautiful vineyards as well as some of the top restaurants and wineries in the world. Among the gorgeous scenery and premier culinary culture, you will also discover some truly unique establishments. Discover the best of Napa Valley when you choose our Experience package. Enjoy a 6-hour private shuttle service to an olive oil tasting at Round Pond, blending experience at Paraduxx, and blind tasting with our partner Elizabeth Spencer. This unique experience also includes a gourmet picnic lunch from Dean & Deluca.

The Experience Napa Valley package is priced at $920.00 for TWO adults, not including tax and gratuity or room rate. Available Sunday-Thursday. Must be booked 7 days in advance of your 2-night minimum stay. When booking online, select the desired room type and add on the Experience Napa Valley package option.
